name: Air Rescue
overview: This game is somewhat like Choplifter, but also borrows from other games such as Defender, Airwolf, and Fort Apocalypse as well, however in this game you fly a zeppelin. Air Rescue was developed by Cleveland M. Blakemore and published by Ion International in Ahoy! 1986/04 (Issue #28). It also got re-published in Loadstar #244, and Stonysoft #0649 as well.
